title: Why only Ring road
content: Man just realised the the ec campus of PES has no activities like the rr campus. This is not fair we demand justice.

comments.body: Most events are conducted by student run clubs, so there lies your solution.
Bro ok i agree that students do take the initiative to organise some events but rr campus had a fashion show today and so many more events compared to the ec campus
Fair enough, there is no fashion club yet in EC campus

Another angle to this is that we have too many clubs here in RR, especially after the addition of CSE vertical clubs

The quality is going down and the count is increasing...

It's difficult for clubs to plan events and get proper funding because there are too many mouths to feed :(
Bro what about the ec campus. I'm from the commerce dept. and we have such less events and clubs
